resources.string: Pass phone across the table and click continue!
Pass phone to the opponent next to you and click continue!

Hint is a fun and challenging game designed for 4 players (2 teams of 2). The object of the game is to manage to get your partner to guess an assigned word using only a single word Hint! You may not converse with your partner about the word. You may only say your single word HINT. You can say it with special voice inflection if you want to, but that is all. If your partner does not guess the word, then you pass the phone to the other person and they will have the chance to do the same thing, but for less points. This continues until either someone guesses the word or there are no more points to be won! To make clear whose turn it is, each set of partners will have a Person A and Person B. Usually if possible, the two A\'s will sit together across from their B partners. Thus the phone will be passed back and forth between the 2 A\'s until one of them manages to get their B partner to guess the word. At that point, the phone is passed over to the B\'s who will now do the same with a new word. There are 6 rounds in total in the game. Each round has two parts, in one part the A\'s will have a turn to give HINTS, then the B\'s.

"The idea is to be able to assess how many hints it will take to guess a particular word. If you give a great hint and your partner ALMOST guesses it....then you may have inadvertently setup the other team for victory! "

Before a round may begin, the two opponents who are going to be giving the hints, must agree upon the word to be used. For example, let\'s say that the A\'s are giving the hints this round. Both of the A\'s will look at the phone and see if the word is guessable, if so, they will tap accept and the round begins. At that point, the first A will give a hint, and then the other A and so on. Note: You MAY skip a word if you and your opponent agree upon it, but beware that if you skip a word, you may not go back to it and furthermore you and your opponent have only 5 skips per game, so together you must spend them wisely! Don\'t skip a word just because it looks challenging! That\'s part of the fun! In order to keep track of who\'s turn it is, look at the status bar at the bottom of the screen that tells you if the A\'s or the B\'s are giving HINTS, as well as which Team\'s A is currently giving the HINT.
Could not get words! Please ensure that you have an internet connection and that the app is up to date!

The object of the game is to manage to get your partner to guess an assigned word using only a single word Hint! You may not converse with your partner about the word. You may only say your single word HINT. You can say it with special voice inflection if you want to, but that is all.
There are 2 teams of two people. Each team has a person A and a person B. The 2 A\'s sit side by side, facing their B partners.
You and the same-lettered opponent next to you will alternate trying to get your partners to guess the same word. The one who acheives it gets the points!
Here you can see what round you are currently in. There are 6 total. In each round the A\'s have a chance to give Hints and the B\'s as well!
Here you can see what the current score is!
This is the word your partner must guess.
Only you and the opponent sitting next to you may see the word. So this cover appears to hide he word. Simply press and hold to reveal the word.
Which 2 are currently giving hints to get their partners to guess the word. (the A\'s or the B\'s).
The team trying to get the points at the moment.
Occasionally an impossible word may pop up. Before beginning the round, you and the opponent next to you must silently agree that the word is guessable (if you two are willing to play the word).
If you and your opponent decide the word is not guessable simply swipe it to the left.
Feel free to swipe, but be aware that you and your opponent only have 5 skips per game!
Once the two of you decide the word is guessable, you begin the round by clicking here!
You have 30 seconds in total to give your one word hint and for your partner to guess.
Once your partner has guessed, immediately mark here whether the answer was correct or not.
If you don\'t finish before time is up, it\'s automatically wrong!
The possible points to be won decreases
Now pass the phone to the oponent sitting next to you.
That person clicks continue and takes his/her turn.
Your team receives the current value of the winnable points spinner
The winnable points reset for the next turn.
Now the other two people give hints (from the A\'s to the B\'s or vice versa).
The other side clicks continue and starts the next round
You are ready to play the game!
"This spinner tells you how many points your team will get if your partner guesses the word. With each attempt (of either opponent), the spinner decreases in value! "
Would you like to see the tutorial?
